name: go-prettier-format
description: Prettier plugin for Go, powered by WASM.

scripts.build:wasm: cd go_src && GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o ../go.wasm .
scripts.test: rm -rf test_result && mkdir test_result && cp tests/*.txt test_result/ && npx prettier --plugin ./src/index.js --write --parser go test_result/*.txt
